messages.subject: Todou Heisuke uploaded ^^
messages.msgSnippet: Hiya ppls! I finally had time to draw Heisuke... the 3rd of the 3 comedians... XD XD XD... his hair s a bit flat in this pic ^^;;; cuz i couldn t fit it in the
messages.messageBody:
Hiya ppls! I finally had time to draw Heisuke... the 3rd of the 3 comedians... XD XD XD... his hair's a bit flat in this pic ^^;;; cuz i couldn't fit it in the paper >.< his face is too long! rofl...
I also re-uploaded Yamazaki...AGAIN... =.=;;; I re-colored it on the computer this morning... it took soooooo long to get his hair really spiky and the red lines just right... and I'm still not finished! ARG ... I still have to touch up the red liner on his face... =.=
anyway, enough of my complaining... ENJOY! XD




Saitoh Worship
